Container.Name: wizarr
Container.Overview:
Wizarr is a automatic user invitation system for Plex and Jellyfin. Create a unique link and share it to a user and they will be invited to your Media Server after they complete there signup proccess! They can even be guided to download the clients and read instructions on how to use your media software!
NOTE: If you wish to use the beta branch, simple append :beta on the end of the Repository URL. You cannot downgrade once you have switched to the beta branch without formatting.

Config.Name: Data Folder
Config.Description: Folder for handling Wizarr related data including database files and cache.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for where you would like Wizarr to reside.
